todos.title: Fix CTE Column Propagation Bug
todos.description: Fixed 'Referenced column result not found' error by checking if result column exists before adding WHERE clause.

todos.title: Fix is() Type Function
todos.description: Fixed temporal literal type checks by using typeof() directly instead of regex patterns.

todos.title: Fix Date/Time Arithmetic
todos.description: Implement date + duration arithmetic (e.g., @1973-12-25 + 7 days). Need to parse quantity literals and add INTERVAL support.

todos.title: Fix Comparison Type Coercion
todos.description: Fix comparison operators to properly coerce types, especially for date/time comparisons with timezone offsets.

todos.title: Fix as() and ofType() Type Functions
todos.description: Fix as() and ofType() functions to properly handle type conversions and filtering.
